actors.name: Anya Taylor-Joy
actors.bio: Anya Taylor-Joy stars as Beth Harmon, a chess prodigy who battles addiction while rising to the top of the chess world.

actors.name: Thomas Brodie-Sangster
actors.bio: Thomas Brodie-Sangster portrays Benny Watts, a skilled chess player who becomes a mentor and friend to Beth.

actors.name: Marielle Heller
actors.bio: Marielle Heller plays Alma Wheatley, Beth's adoptive mother who supports her chess career despite her own struggles.

actors.name: Harry Melling
actors.bio: Harry Melling plays Harry Beltik, a former state champion who helps Beth improve her game and becomes romantically involved with her.

actors.name: Bill Camp
actors.bio: Bill Camp portrays Mr. Shaibel, the janitor who first teaches Beth how to play chess in the basement of the orphanage.

actors.name: Moses Ingram
actors.bio: Moses Ingram plays Jolene, Beth's close friend from the orphanage who provides emotional support and encouragement.

actors.name: Chloe Pirrie
actors.bio: Chloe Pirrie portrays Alice Harmon, Beth's biological mother whose tragic story deeply impacts Beth's life.

actors.name: Jacob Fortune-Lloyd
actors.bio: Jacob Fortune-Lloyd plays D.L. Townes, a chess player and journalist who becomes a romantic interest for Beth.
